english.segment1: You don't have to say it out loud. One look can cut to the bone. A quick glare when the angry hurts there. Tells me just what i've done wrong
english.segment2: Your eyes can speak to me. Deeper then words can go. Your eyes can reach for me. Tears are the language of the soul
english.segment3: When a smile lights up your eyes. Laughter can't say what you could. With your sweet stare it's like heaven is there. And an overflow of everything good
english.segment4: Your eyes can speak to me. Deeper then words can go. Your eyes can reach for me. Tears are the language of the soul
english.segment5: Dancing waters dark harbors. Tears have every reason to fall. Like pounding rain or gentle whispers. Oh i listen when they talk
